mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

Thank you for providing the internal data to update the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32). We have successfully incorporated the latest validations and current statuses into the checklist.

Please find below the updated checklist:

### Updated Checklist Table
| Checklist Item                        | Status      | Comment                                                                                      | Source                               |
|---------------------------------------|-------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                 | Validated   | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.               | DIM_CompanyAddressProof             |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated   | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                              | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated   | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.            | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails     |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending     | Directorship information is available but verification is pending for some directors.       | DIM_CompanyDirectorship             |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Pending     | Various tax documents are available but some require additional info or renewal.            | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments             |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Pending     | Multiple regulatory compliance records exist, but some are under review.                   | DIM_CompanyRegulatory               |
| Company Business Scope                | Validated   | Detailed business scope information is available, highlighting leadership roles and services.| DIM_CompanyBusinessScope            |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Missing     | No PEP screening data found for the given LEI ID.                                           | NA                                  |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated   | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.| Annual Report                       |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated   | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.       | Annual Report                       |

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else you need regarding this checklist.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
